email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Voyager, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I understand your concern on the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The vessel is confirmed available, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and share the charter party for review. Also, could you clarify the laytime calculation? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The laycan is confirmed as 15-20 October. Laytime is 72 hours total, with 24 hours for NOR and 48 hours for loading/discharge. I’ll send over the charter party draft shortly. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laytime terms are acceptable. I’ll review the charter party once received and get back to you. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the charter party draft for your review. Let me know if there are any amendments required. Once confirmed, we can proceed to finalize the fixture. Thanks, Sarah
